name: Sunim Rubber
overview:
Established in the year 1974, we, “Sunim Rubber Enterprise”, are counted among the recognized organization engaged in manufacturing and supplying a Rubber Sealing Compound. The range offered by us includes Rubber Compound, Precured Tread Rubber, Bonding Gum and Rubber Sealing Ring, to name a few.

Our Team: Product managers Formulation scientists Researchers Quality controllers Warehousing experts Market analysts Sales and marketing personnel Skilled labors

Our Quality Assurance: Quality has always been the prime concern of our organization. Hence, we undertake every possible step to maintain the quality of our entire range of Rubber Compound, Precured Tread Rubber, Bonding Gum and Rubber Sealing Ring.

Our Infrastructure: We have maintained a modern infrastructure, which is based in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India across a wide area. This infrastructure helps us in catering to the variegated requirements of our clients. We have also divided our facility into various departments to carry out business related activities in a proper manner.

Client Satisfaction: Attaining the maximum level of customer satisfaction has been one of the major motives of our organization, since its inception. For this, the Rubber Compound, Precured Tread Rubber, Bonding Gum and Rubber Sealing Ring offered by us are in compliance with requirements of our clients.

Why Us?: Offering world class quality products Assuring complete quality compliance Following competitive pricing policy Ensuring timely delivery of products at all times Exceeding customer’s expectations through excellent services
